transliteration: Allahumma habbib ilaynal-imana wa zayyinhu fi qulubina, wa karrih ilaynal-kufra wal-fusuqa wal-'isyan.
translation: O Allah, make faith beloved to us and beautify it in our hearts, and make disbelief, wickedness, and disobedience hateful to us.

arabic: اللهم اغفر لي۞ وارحمني۞ واهدني۞ وعافني۞ وارزقني.
transliteration: Allahumma ighfir li, warhamni, wahdini, wa 'afini, warzuqni.
translation: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy upon me, guide me, grant me well-being, and provide for me.

arabic: رب اشرح لي صدري ويسر لي أمري.
transliteration: Rabbi ishrah li sadri wa yassir li amri.
translation: My Lord, expand for me my breast and ease for me my task.

arabic: رب لا تذرني فردًا وأنت خير الوارثين.
transliteration: Rabbi la tadharni fardan wa anta khayrul-waritheen.
translation: My Lord, do not leave me alone [with no heir], while You are the best of inheritors.

arabic: رب إني مسني الضر وأنت أرحم الراحمين.
transliteration: Rabbi inni massaniyad-durru wa anta arhamur-rahimeen.
translation: My Lord, indeed adversity has touched me, and You are the Most Merciful of the merciful.

arabic: رب هب لي حكمًا وألحقني بالصالحين.
transliteration: Rabbi hab li hukman wa alhiqni bis-salihin.
translation: My Lord, grant me wisdom and join me with the righteous.

arabic: رب زدني علمًا.
transliteration: Rabbi zidni 'ilma.
translation: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.

arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من الهم والحزن۞ والعجز والكسل۞ والبخل والجبن۞ وضلع الدين۞ وغلبة الرجال.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazani, wal-'ajzi wal-kasali, wal-bukhli wal-jubni, wa dala'id-dayni wa ghalabatir-rijal.
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety and grief, from weakness and laziness, from miserliness and cowardice, from the burden of debts and from being overpowered by men.

arabic: اللهم إني عبدك۞ ابن عبدك۞ ابن أمتك۞ ناصيتي بيدك۞ ماضٍ فيّ حكمك۞ عدلٌ فيّ قضاؤك...
transliteration: Allahumma inni 'abduk, ibnu 'abdik, ibnu amatik, nasiyati biyadik, madin fiyya hukmuk, 'adlun fiyya qada'uk...
translation: O Allah, I am Your servant, son of Your servant, son of Your maidservant, my forelock is in Your hand, Your command over me is forever executed and Your decree over me is just...

arabic: لا إله إلا أنت سبحانك إني كنت من الظالمين.
transliteration: La ilaha illa anta subhanaka inni kuntu minaz-zalimeen.
translation: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers.

arabic: حسبي الله لا إله إلا هو۞ عليه توكلت۞ وهو رب العرش العظيم.
transliteration: Hasbiyallahu la ilaha illa huwa, 'alayhi tawakkaltu, wa huwa rabbul-'arshil-'adheem.
translation: Sufficient for me is Allah; there is no deity except Him. On Him I have relied, and He is the Lord of the Great Throne.

arabic: اللهم اجعل القرآن ربيع قلبي ونور صدري وجلاء حزني وذهاب همي.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'al al-Qur'ana rabi'a qalbi wa nura sadri wa jala'a huzni wa dhahaba hammi.
translation: O Allah, make the Quran the spring of my heart, the light of my chest, the remover of my sadness, and the reliever of my anxiety.

arabic: اللهم رحمتك أرجو۞ فلا تكلني إلى نفسي طرفة عين۞ وأصلح لي شأني كله.
transliteration: Allahumma rahmataka arju, fala takilni ila nafsi tarfata 'ayn, wa aslih li sha'ni kullahu.
translation: O Allah, I hope for Your mercy, so do not leave me to myself even for the blink of an eye, and rectify all of my affairs.

arabic: اللهم إليك أشكو ضعف قوتي۞ وقلة حيلتي۞ وهواني على الناس.
transliteration: Allahumma ilayka ashku da'fa quwwati, wa qillata hileti, wa hawni 'alan-nas.
translation: O Allah, to You I complain of my weakness, my lack of resources, and my humiliation before the people.

arabic: يا حي يا قيوم برحمتك أستغيث۞ أصلح لي شأني كله.
transliteration: Ya Hayyu ya Qayyum birahmatika astaghith, aslih li sha'ni kullahu.
translation: O Ever-Living, O Sustainer, by Your mercy I seek help. Rectify for me all of my affairs.

arabic: اللهم لا سهل إلا ما جعلته سهلاً۞ وأنت تجعل الحزن إذا شئت سهلاً.
transliteration: Allahumma la sahla illa ma ja'altahu sahlan, wa anta taj'alul-hazna idha shi'ta sahlan.
translation: O Allah, nothing is easy except what You make easy, and You make the difficult easy if You wish.

arabic: اللهم اكشف كربنا۞ ويسر أمرنا۞ وارحم ضعفنا.
transliteration: Allahumma kshif kurbana, wa yassir amrana, warham da'fana.
translation: O Allah, remove our distress, make our affairs easy, and have mercy on our weakness.

arabic: أستغفر الله العظيم الذي لا إله إلا هو الحي القيوم وأتوب إليه.
transliteration: Astaghfirullahal-'adheem alladhi la ilaha illa huwa al-Hayyul Qayyum wa atubu ilayh.
translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah the Mighty, Whom there is none worthy of worship except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer, and I repent to Him.

arabic: اللهم اغفر لي ذنبي كله۞ دقه وجله۞ وأوله وآخره۞ وعلانيته وسره.
transliteration: Allahumma ighfir li dhanbi kullahu, diqqahu wa jillahu, wa awwalahu wa akhirahu, wa 'alaniyatahu wa sirrahu.
translation: O Allah, forgive all my sins, the small and the great, the first and the last, the apparent and the hidden.

arabic: رب اغفر لي وتب عليّ إنك أنت التواب الرحيم.
transliteration: Rabbi ighfir li wa tub 'alayya innaka antat-Tawwabur-Raheem.
translation: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance, for You are the Ever-Accepting of repentance, the Most Merciful.

arabic: اللهم إني ظلمت نفسي ظلمًا كثيرًا۞ ولا يغفر الذنوب إلا أنت.
transliteration: Allahumma inni dhalamtu nafsi dhulman kathiran, wa la yaghfirudh-dhunuba illa ant.
translation: O Allah, I have wronged myself greatly, and none forgives sins except You.

arabic: اللهم أنت ربي لا إله إلا أنت۞ خلقتني وأنا عبدك۞ وأنا على عهدك ووعدك ما استطعت۞ أعوذ بك من شر ما صنعت۞ أبوء لك بنعمتك عليّ وأبوء بذنبي فاغفر لي فإنه لا يغفر الذنوب إلا أنت.
transliteration: Allahumma anta Rabbi la ilaha illa ant, khalaqtani wa ana 'abduk, wa ana 'ala 'ahdika wa wa'dika ma astata't, a'udhu bika min sharri ma sana't, abu'u laka bi ni'matika 'alayya wa abu'u bi dhanbi, faghfir li fa innahu la yaghfirudh-dhunuba illa ant.
translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is none worthy of worship except You. You created me and I am Your servant, and I am upon Your covenant and promise as much as I am able. I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done. I acknowledge Your favor upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for none forgives sins except You.

arabic: ربنا أفرغ علينا صبرًا وتوفنا مسلمين.
transliteration: Rabbana afrigh 'alayna sabran wa tawaffana muslimin.
translation: Our Lord, pour upon us patience and let us die as Muslims.

arabic: اللهم اجعلني من الشاكرين لنعمتك۞ الراضين بقضائك.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'alni min ash-shakireena lini'matik, ar-radheena biqada'ik.
translation: O Allah, make me among those who are grateful for Your blessings and content with Your decree.

arabic: اللهم لك الحمد حتى ترضى۞ ولك الحمد إذا رضيت۞ ولك الحمد بعد الرضا.
transliteration: Allahumma lakal-hamdu hatta tardha, wa lakal-hamdu idha radhita, wa lakal-hamdu ba'dar-rida.
translation: O Allah, to You belongs all praise until You are pleased, and to You belongs all praise when You are pleased, and to You belongs all praise after You are pleased.

arabic: اللهم اجعلني من عبادك الصابرين.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'alni min 'ibadikas-sabireen.
translation: O Allah, make me among Your patient servants.

arabic: اللهم اجعلني حامدًا شاكرًا راضيًا بقضائك في كل حين.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'alni hamidan shakiran radhiyan biqada'ik fi kulli hin.
translation: O Allah, make me one who praises You, thanks You, and is content with Your decree at all times.

arabic: ربنا لا تؤاخذنا إن نسينا أو أخطأنا.
transliteration: Rabbana la tu'akhidhna in naseena aw akhta'na.
translation: Our Lord, do not impose blame upon us if we have forgotten or erred.

arabic: ربنا ظلمنا أنفسنا وإن لم تغفر لنا وترحمنا لنكونن من الخاسرين.
transliteration: Rabbana dhalamna anfusana wa illam taghfir lana watarhamna lanakunanna minal-khasireen.
translation: Our Lord, we have wronged ourselves, and if You do not forgive us and have mercy upon us, we will surely be among the losers.

arabic: ربنا هب لنا من أزواجنا وذرياتنا قرة أعين.
transliteration: Rabbana hab lana min azwajina wa dhurriyatina qurrata a'yun.
translation: Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes.

arabic: ربنا لا تزغ قلوبنا بعد إذ هديتنا وهب لنا من لدنك رحمة.
transliteration: Rabbana la tuzigh qulubana ba'da idh hadaytana wa hab lana min ladunka rahmah.
translation: Our Lord, do not let our hearts deviate after You have guided us and grant us from Yourself mercy.

arabic: اللهم مصرف القلوب صرف قلوبنا على طاعتك.
transliteration: Allahumma musarrifal-qulub, sarrif qulubana 'ala ta'atik.
translation: O Allah, Controller of the hearts, direct our hearts to Your obedience.

arabic: اللهم حبب إلينا الإيمان وزينه في قلوبنا۞ وكره إلينا الكفر والفسوق والعصيان.
transliteration: Allahumma habbib ilaynal-imana wa zayyinhu fi qulubina, wa karrih ilaynal-kufra wal-fusuqa wal-'isyan.
translation: O Allah, make faith beloved to us and beautify it in our hearts, and make disbelief, wickedness, and disobedience hateful to us.

arabic: اللهم اغفر لي۞ وارحمني۞ واهدني۞ وعافني۞ وارزقني.
transliteration: Allahumma ighfir li, warhamni, wahdini, wa 'afini, warzuqni.
translation: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy upon me, guide me, grant me well-being, and provide for me.

arabic: رب اشرح لي صدري ويسر لي أمري.
transliteration: Rabbi ishrah li sadri wa yassir li amri.
translation: My Lord, expand for me my breast and ease for me my task.

arabic: رب لا تذرني فردًا وأنت خير الوارثين.
transliteration: Rabbi la tadharni fardan wa anta khayrul-waritheen.
translation: My Lord, do not leave me alone [with no heir], while You are the best of inheritors.

arabic: رب إني مسني الضر وأنت أرحم الراحمين.
transliteration: Rabbi inni massaniyad-durru wa anta arhamur-rahimeen.
translation: My Lord, indeed adversity has touched me, and You are the Most Merciful of the merciful.

arabic: رب هب لي حكمًا وألحقني بالصالحين.
transliteration: Rabbi hab li hukman wa alhiqni bis-salihin.
translation: My Lord, grant me wisdom and join me with the righteous.

arabic: رب زدني علمًا.
transliteration: Rabbi zidni 'ilma.
translation: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.

arabic: اللهم صيبًا نافعًا.
transliteration: Allahumma sayyiban nafi'an.
translation: O Allah, (bring) beneficial rain clouds.

arabic: اللهم اجعله سقيا رحمة۞ لا سقيا عذاب۞ ولا هدم۞ ولا غرق.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'alhu siqyan rahmatin, la siqyan 'adhabin, wa la hadman, wa la gharqan.
translation: O Allah, make it a mercy, not a punishment, not destruction, not drowning.

arabic: اللهم اسق عبادك وبهائمك۞ وانشر رحمتك۞ وأحيِ بلدك الميت.
transliteration: Allahumma isqi 'ibadak wa baha'imak, wanshur rahmatak, wa ahyi baladak al-mayit.
translation: O Allah, give water to Your servants and Your animals, spread Your mercy, and revive Your dead land.

arabic: اللهم حوالينا ولا علينا۞ اللهم على الآكام والظراب۞ وبطون الأودية۞ ومنابت الشجر.
transliteration: Allahumma hawalayna wa la 'alayna, Allahumma 'alal-akam wadh-dhirab, wa butunil-awdiyah, wa manabit ash-shajar.
translation: O Allah, (let it rain) around us and not upon us. O Allah, (let it rain) on the hills, mountains, valleys, and places where trees grow.

arabic: سبحان الذي يسبح الرعد بحمده والملائكة من خيفته.
transliteration: Subhana alladhi yusabbihu ar-ra'du bihamdihi wal-mala'ikatu min khifatih.
translation: Glory be to Him Whom the thunder glorifies with His praise and the angels out of fear of Him.

arabic: اللهم رب الناس أذهب البأس۞ اشف أنت الشافي۞ لا شفاء إلا شفاؤك.
transliteration: Allahumma rabban-nas, adhhibil-ba's, ishfi antash-shafi, la shifa'a illa shifa'uk.
translation: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the harm, heal, for You are the Healer. There is no healing except Your healing.

arabic: أسأل الله العظيم رب العرش العظيم أن يشفيك.
transliteration: As'alullahal-'adheem rabbal-'arshil-'adheem an yashfiyak.
translation: I ask Allah the Mighty, Lord of the Mighty Throne, to heal you.

arabic: اللهم اشفه شفاءً لا يغادر سقمًا.
transliteration: Allahumma ishfi shifa'an la yughadiru saqaman.
translation: O Allah, heal him with a healing that leaves no illness.

arabic: اللهم إنا نسألك من كل اسم هو لك أن تشفي مرضانا ومرضى المسلمين.
transliteration: Allahumma inna nas'aluka min kulli ismin huwa lak an tashfi mardana wa marda al-muslimeen.
translation: O Allah, we ask You by every name that belongs to You to heal our sick and the sick among the Muslims.

arabic: اللهم اجعل مرضه كفارة له وسببًا في رفع درجته.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'al maradhahu kaffaratan lahu wa sababan fi raf'i darajatih.
translation: O Allah, make his illness an expiation for him and a means of raising his rank.

arabic: اللهم اغفر له وارحمه۞ وعافه واعف عنه.
transliteration: Allahumma ighfir lahu warhamhu, wa 'afihi wa'fu 'anhu.
translation: O Allah, forgive him, have mercy on him, grant him well-being, and pardon him.

arabic: اللهم اجعل قبره روضة من رياض الجنة.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'al qabrahu rawdatan min riyadil-jannah.
translation: O Allah, make his grave a garden from the gardens of Paradise.

arabic: اللهم ثبّته عند السؤال.
transliteration: Allahumma thabbit-hu 'indas-su'al.
translation: O Allah, make him firm when questioned.

arabic: اللهم اجعل مقامه في عليين۞ مع النبيين والصديقين.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'al maqamahu fi 'illiyyin, ma'an-nabiyyeen was-siddiqeen.
translation: O Allah, place him in 'Illiyyin, with the prophets and the truthful.

arabic: اللهم وسّع مدخله۞ واغسله بالماء والثلج والبرد.
transliteration: Allahumma wassi' madkhalahu, wagsilhu bil-ma'i wath-thalji wal-barad.
translation: O Allah, widen his entrance, and wash him with water, snow, and hail.

arabic: اللهم ارزقني زوجًا/زوجةً صالحًا/صالحة يكون عونًا لي على طاعتك.
transliteration: Allahumma arzuqni zawjan/zawjatan salihan/salihatan yakunu 'awnan li 'ala ta'atik.
translation: O Allah, grant me a righteous spouse who will help me in obeying You.

arabic: اللهم إن كان رزقي في السماء فأنزله۞ وإن كان في الأرض فأخرجه.
transliteration: Allahumma in kana rizqi fis-sama'i fa anzilhu, wa in kana fil-ardi fa akhrijhu.
translation: O Allah, if my provision is in the sky, bring it down, and if it is in the earth, bring it out.

arabic: اللهم اكفني بحلالك عن حرامك۞ وأغنني بفضلك عمن سواك.
transliteration: Allahumma kfini bihalalika 'an haramik, wa aghnini bifadlika 'amman siwak.
translation: O Allah, suffice me with what You have made lawful against what You have made unlawful, and make me independent of all others by Your bounty.

arabic: اللهم افتح لي أبواب رزقك الحلال وبارك لي فيه.
transliteration: Allahumma iftah li abwaba rizqikal-halali wa barik li fih.
translation: O Allah, open for me the gates of Your lawful provision and bless me in it.

arabic: اللهم ارزقني الذرية الصالحة والرزق الواسع المبارك.
transliteration: Allahumma arzuqni dhurriyatan salihah war-rizqal-wasi'al-mubarak.
translation: O Allah, grant me righteous offspring and blessed, abundant provision.

arabic: بسم الله الذي لا يضر مع اسمه شيء في الأرض ولا في السماء وهو السميع العليم.
transliteration: Bismillah alladhi la yadurru ma' ismihi shay'un fil-ardi wa la fis-sama'i wa huwa as-sami'ul-'aleem.
translation: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing can cause harm on earth nor in the heavens, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من شر ما خلقت.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min sharri ma khalaqt.
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of what You have created.

arabic: أعوذ بكلمات الله التامات من شر ما خلق.
transliteration: A'udhu bikalimatillahit-tammati min sharri ma khalaq.
translation: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

arabic: اللهم احفظني من بين يدي ومن خلفي۞ وعن يميني وعن شمالي۞ ومن فوقي۞ وأعوذ بعظمتك أن أُغتال من تحتي.
transliteration: Allahumma ihfazni min bayni yadayya wa min khalfi, wa 'an yameeni wa 'an shimali, wa min fawqi, wa a'udhu bi'azamatika an ughtala min tahti.
translation: O Allah, protect me from before me and behind me, from my right and my left, and from above me, and I seek refuge in Your greatness from being taken unaware from beneath me.

arabic: اللهم اجعلني في حرزك وأمانك وجوارك.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'alni fi hirzik wa amanik wa jiwarik.
translation: O Allah, place me in Your protection, security, and nearness.

arabic: اللهم اجعلني مقيم الصلاة ومن ذريتي.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'alni muqimas-salah wa min dhurriyati.
translation: O Allah, make me one who establishes prayer and from my offspring.

arabic: اللهم أعني على ذكرك وشكرك وحسن عبادتك.
transliteration: Allahumma a'inni 'ala dhikrika wa shukrika wa husni 'ibadatik.
translation: O Allah, help me to remember You, thank You, and worship You in the best way.

arabic: اللهم طهر قلبي من النفاق وعملي من الرياء ولساني من الكذب.
transliteration: Allahumma tahhir qalbi minan-nifaqi wa 'amali minar-riya'i wa lisani minal-kadhib.
translation: O Allah, purify my heart from hypocrisy, my deeds from showing off, and my tongue from lying.

arabic: اللهم اجعل صلاتي قرة عين لي.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'al salati qurrata 'aynin li.
translation: O Allah, make my prayer a delight to my eyes.

arabic: اللهم تقبل صلاتنا واغفر لنا ذنوبنا.
transliteration: Allahumma taqabbal salatana waghfir lana dhunubana.
translation: O Allah, accept our prayers and forgive our sins.

arabic: سبحان ربي الأعلى.
transliteration: Subhana Rabbiyal-A'la.
translation: Glory be to my Lord, the Most High.

arabic: اللهم اغفر لي ذنبي كله۞ دقه وجله۞ وأوله وآخره.
transliteration: Allahumma ighfir li dhanbi kullahu, diqqahu wa jillahu, wa awwalahu wa akhirahu.
translation: O Allah, forgive all my sins, the small and the great, the first and the last.

arabic: اللهم لك سجدت وبك آمنت ولك أسلمت.
transliteration: Allahumma laka sajadtu wa bika amantu wa laka aslamt.
translation: O Allah, to You I have prostrated, in You I have believed, and to You I have submitted.

arabic: رب اغفر لي۞ رب اغفر لي.
transliteration: Rabbi ighfir li, Rabbi ighfir li.
translation: My Lord, forgive me, my Lord, forgive me.

arabic: التحيات لله۞ والصلوات۞ والطيبات۞ السلام عليك أيها النبي...
transliteration: At-tahiyyatu lillah, was-salawatu, wat-tayyibat, as-salamu 'alayka ayyuhan-nabiyyu...
translation: All compliments, prayers, and pure words are due to Allah. Peace be upon you, O Prophet...

arabic: اللهم اهدني فيمن هديت۞ وعافني فيمن عافيت.
transliteration: Allahumma ihdini fiman hadayt, wa 'afini fiman 'afayt.
translation: O Allah, guide me among those You have guided, and grant me well-being among those You have granted well-being.

arabic: اللهم إنا نستعينك ونستغفرك ونؤمن بك ونتوكل عليك.
transliteration: Allahumma inna nasta'inuk wa nastaghfiruk wa nu'minu bika wa natawakkalu 'alayk.
translation: O Allah, we seek Your help, ask Your forgiveness, believe in You, and rely on You.

arabic: اللهم إياك نعبد ولك نصلي ونسجد۞ وإليك نسعى ونحفد.
transliteration: Allahumma iyyaka na'budu wa laka nusalli wa nasjud, wa ilayka nas'a wa nahfid.
translation: O Allah, You alone we worship, to You we pray and prostrate, and to You we strive and hasten.

arabic: اللهم لا مانع لما أعطيت۞ ولا معطي لما منعت۞ ولا ينفع ذا الجد منك الجد.
transliteration: Allahumma la mani'a lima a'tayt, wa la mu'tiya lima mana't, wa la yanfa'u dhal-jaddi minkal-jadd.
translation: O Allah, none can prevent what You give, none can give what You prevent, and the might of the mighty cannot benefit them against You.

arabic: اللهم إنك عفو تحب العفو فاعفُ عني.
transliteration: Allahumma innaka 'afuwwun tuhibbul-'afwa fa'fu 'anni.
translation: O Allah, You are Most Forgiving, and You love forgiveness, so forgive me.

arabic: اللهم لك الحمد۞ أنت نور السماوات والأرض ومن فيهن.
transliteration: Allahumma lakal-hamdu, anta nurus-samawati wal-ardi wa man fihin.
translation: O Allah, to You belongs all praise. You are the Light of the heavens and the earth and all that is in them.

arabic: اللهم اجعلني من المخبتين لك۞ اللهم اجعلني من المتوكلين عليك.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'alni minal-mukhbitina lak, Allahumma ij'alni minal-mutawakkilina 'alayk.
translation: O Allah, make me among those who are humble before You, O Allah, make me among those who rely on You.

arabic: اللهم ارزقني قيام الليل بخشوع ورضا.
transliteration: Allahumma arzuqni qiyamal-layli bi khushu'in wa rida.
translation: O Allah, grant me standing in prayer at night with humility and contentment.

arabic: اللهم اجعل في قلبي نورًا وفي سمعي نورًا وفي بصري نورًا.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'al fi qalbi nura wa fi sam'i nura wa fi basari nura.
translation: O Allah, place light in my heart, light in my hearing, and light in my sight.

arabic: اللهم اجعلني من الذين يبيتون لربهم سُجدًا وقيامًا.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'alni min alladhina yabituna lirabbihim sujjadan wa qiyaman.
translation: O Allah, make me among those who spend the night prostrating and standing before their Lord.

arabic: اللهم إني أستخيرك بعلمك۞ وأستقدرك بقدرتك۞ وأسالك من فضلك العظيم...
transliteration: Allahumma inni astakhiruka bi'ilmik, wa astaqdiruka bi qudratik, wa as'aluka min fadlikal-'adheem...
translation: O Allah, I seek Your guidance by virtue of Your knowledge, and I seek ability by virtue of Your power, and I ask You of Your great bounty...

arabic: اللهم إن كنت تعلم أن هذا الأمر خير لي في ديني ومعاشي وعاقبة أمري...
transliteration: Allahumma in kunta ta'lamu anna hadhal-amra khayrun li fi deeni wa ma'ashi wa 'aqibati amri...
translation: O Allah, if You know that this matter is good for me in my religion, my livelihood, and the outcome of my affairs...

arabic: اللهم إن كنت تعلم أن هذا الأمر شر لي فاصرفه عني واصرفني عنه...
transliteration: Allahumma in kunta ta'lamu anna hadhal-amra sharrun li fasrifhu 'anni wasrifni 'anhu...
translation: O Allah, if You know that this matter is bad for me, then turn it away from me and turn me away from it...

arabic: اللهم اقدر لي الخير حيث كان ثم رضني به.
transliteration: Allahumma uqdur li al-khayra haythu kana thumma raddini bih.
translation: O Allah, decree for me what is good wherever it may be and make me pleased with it.

arabic: اللهم اجعل لي فيه الخير والبركة واليسر.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'al li fih al-khayra wal-barakata wal-yusra.
translation: O Allah, make for me in it goodness, blessing, and ease.

arabic: اللهم بلغنا رمضان لا فاقدين ولا مفقودين.
transliteration: Allahumma ballighna ramadana la faqidin wa la mafqudin.
translation: O Allah, let us reach Ramadan without being deficient or lost.

arabic: اللهم أعنا على صيامه وقيامه على الوجه الذي يرضيك عنا.
transliteration: Allahumma a'inna 'ala siyamihi wa qiyamihi 'alal-wajhil-ladhi yardahu 'anna.
translation: O Allah, help us to fast and stand in prayer in a way that pleases You.

arabic: اللهم اجعلنا فيه من عتقائك من النار.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'alna fih min 'utaqa'ik minan-nar.
translation: O Allah, make us among those whom You free from the Fire.

arabic: اللهم تقبل صيامنا وقيامنا وصالح أعمالنا.
transliteration: Allahumma taqabbal siyamana wa qiyamana wa saliha a'malina.
translation: O Allah, accept our fasting, our standing in prayer, and our righteous deeds.

arabic: اللهم اجعل رمضان فاتحة خير لنا في الدنيا والآخرة.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'al ramadana fatihata khayrin lana fid-dunya wal-akhirah.
translation: O Allah, make Ramadan an opening of good for us in this world and the Hereafter.

arabic: اللهم اجعل حجي مبرورًا وذنبي مغفورًا وسعيي مشكورًا.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'al hajji mabruran wa dhanbi maghfuran wa sa'yi mashkuran.
translation: O Allah, make my Hajj accepted, my sins forgiven, and my efforts rewarded.

arabic: اللهم تقبل منا الحج والعمرة واجعله خالصًا لوجهك.
transliteration: Allahumma taqabbal minna al-hajja wal-'umrata waj'alhu khalisan li wajhik.
translation: O Allah, accept from us our Hajj and Umrah and make them purely for Your sake.

arabic: اللهم ارزقني زيارة بيتك الحرام في عافية وأمان.
transliteration: Allahumma arzuqni ziyarata baytik al-haram fi 'afiyatin wa aman.
translation: O Allah, grant me the visit to Your Sacred House in well-being and security.

arabic: اللهم اجعلني من ضيوفك المقبولين.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'alni min duyufikal-maqbulin.
translation: O Allah, make me among Your accepted guests.

arabic: اللهم اغسلني من الذنوب والخطايا كما يُغسل الثوب الأبيض من الدنس.
transliteration: Allahumma ighsilni minadh-dhunubi wal-khataaya kama yughsalu ath-thawbul-abyadhu minad-danas.
translation: O Allah, wash me of my sins and mistakes as a white garment is washed of filth.

arabic: اللهم إنك عفو تحب العفو فاعفُ عني.
transliteration: Allahumma innaka 'afuwwun tuhibbul-'afwa fa'fu 'anni.
translation: O Allah, You are Most Forgiving, and You love forgiveness, so forgive me.

arabic: اللهم بلغنا ليلة القدر وأعنا على قيامها.
transliteration: Allahumma ballighna laylatal-qadri wa a'inna 'ala qiyamiha.
translation: O Allah, let us reach the Night of Decree and help us to stand in prayer during it.

arabic: اللهم اجعلنا فيها من المقبولين المرحومين.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'alna fiha minal-maqbulin al-marhumeen.
translation: O Allah, make us among those who are accepted and shown mercy in it.

arabic: اللهم افتح لنا فيها أبواب رحمتك ورضوانك.
transliteration: Allahumma iftah lana fiha abwaba rahmatik wa ridwanik.
translation: O Allah, open for us in it the gates of Your mercy and pleasure.

arabic: اللهم اجعلنا من عتقائك في هذه الليلة المباركة.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'alna min 'utaqa'ik fi hadhihil-laylatil-mubarakah.
translation: O Allah, make us among those whom You free in this blessed night.

arabic: تقبل الله منا ومنكم صالح الأعمال.
transliteration: Taqabbal Allahu minna wa minkum salihal a'mal.
translation: May Allah accept from us and you the righteous deeds.

arabic: اللهم اجعل عيدنا فرحًا بطاعتك ورضاك.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'al 'idana farhan bi ta'atika wa ridak.
translation: O Allah, make our Eid a joy through obedience to You and Your pleasure.

arabic: اللهم اجعلنا من العائدين الفائزين.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'alna minal 'aidin wal fa'izin.
translation: O Allah, make us among those who return (to You) as successful ones.

arabic: اللهم أدم علينا الفرح والسرور ونعمة الإسلام.
transliteration: Allahumma adim 'alayna al-farha was-suroor wa ni'matal Islam.
translation: O Allah, perpetuate for us joy, happiness, and the blessing of Islam.

arabic: اللهم اجعل هذا العيد عيد خير وبركة وسلام على أمتنا.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'al hadhal 'id 'idan khayrin wa barakatin wa salamin 'ala ummatina.
translation: O Allah, make this Eid an Eid of goodness, blessings, and peace for our nation.

arabic: سبحان الذي يسبح الرعد بحمده والملائكة من خيفته.
transliteration: Subhanalladhi yusabbihur ra'du bihamdihi wal mala'ikatu min khifatihi.
translation: Glory be to Him Whom the thunder glorifies with His praise, and the angels out of fear of Him.

arabic: اللهم لا تقتلنا بغضبك۞ ولا تهلكنا بعذابك۞ وعافنا قبل ذلك.
transliteration: Allahumma la taqtulna bi ghadabika, wa la tuhlikna bi 'adhabika, wa 'afina qabla dhalik.
translation: O Allah, do not kill us with Your wrath, do not destroy us with Your punishment, and grant us well-being before that.

arabic: اللهم حوالينا ولا علينا۞ اللهم على الآكام والظراب وبطون الأودية ومنابت الشجر.
transliteration: Allahumma hawalayna wa la 'alayna, Allahumma 'alal akam wadh-dhirab wa butunil awdiyah wa manabitish shajar.
translation: O Allah, (send rain) around us and not upon us. O Allah, (send rain) upon the hills, small mountains, valley bottoms, and places where trees grow.

arabic: اللهم اجعلها أمطار خير وبركة۞ لا هدم فيها ولا غرق.
transliteration: Allahumma ij'alha amtaran khayrin wa barakatin, la hadma fiha wa la gharq.
translation: O Allah, make it rains of goodness and blessing, with no destruction or flooding.

arabic: اللهم إنا نعوذ بك من الزلازل والمحن۞ ومن الفتن ما ظهر منها وما بطن.
transliteration: Allahumma inna na'udhu bika minaz zalazil wal mihan, wa minat fitani ma zahara minha wa ma batan.
translation: O Allah, we seek refuge in You from earthquakes, calamities, and from trials both apparent and hidden.
